entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
